EmailTemplate.name: 2017_10_Global_NBAA_JetWave Invitation.2017_10_Global_Email_JetWave Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Experience Honeywell's JetWave and GoDirect at NBAA 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Inflight Connectivity Doesn't Have to Break Your Budget!
You Are Invited to experience Honeywell’s JetWaveTM at a live demonstration utilizing GoDirect Services in our Falcon 900EX aircraft during NBAA 2017.
Honeywell’s JetWave satellite communications terminals enable global connectivity via Inmarsat Aviation’s Global Xpress Ka-band service - Jet ConneX. JetWave provides affordable broadband-class data connectivity for a consistently outstanding passenger experience all over the world.
To schedule your demonstration, come to booth N5100 or call Steve Gomez <[[mailto:Steve.Gomez@Honeywell.com]]> at 602.432.3205.
The demonstrations take place at Atlantic Aviation, Las Vegas Executive Air Terminal, McCarran International Airport (LAS), 275 East Tropicana Ave.
LEARN MORE ABOUT JETWAVE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/wifithatflies]]>
